results.firPara: Burnley are close to completing a £3.5m move for the Barnsley defender Marc Roberts.
results.secPara: The 26-year-old, who limped out of Barnsleys shock defeat in the FA Cup replay against the League Two side Blackpool, has impressed this season in the Championship having joined from non-league Halifax Town in 2015.
results.webTitle: Burnley close in on £3.5m move for Barnsley defender Marc Roberts

results.firPara: Michail Antonio is set to sign a five-and-a-half year contract at West Ham worth £70,000 a week as a reward for the impressive performances that have earned a call-up to the England squad.
results.secPara: Antonio, who joined West Ham in September 2015 for around £7m, agreed a four-year deal last summer having established himself as one of Slaven Bilics key players by scoring eight Premier League goals.
results.webTitle: West Ham’s Michail Antonio set to sign contract worth £70,000 a week

results.firPara: Plus most relegations for one city in a single season, players sent off while on a stretcher, and more. Send your questions and answers to knowledge@theguardian.com or tweet @TheKnowledge_GU
results.secPara: Plus most relegations for one city in a single season, players sent off while on a stretcher, and more. Send your questions and answers to knowledge@theguardian.com or tweet @TheKnowledge_GU
results.webTitle: What is the fastest goal scored by a football team not kicking off? | The Knowledge

results.firPara: Peter Lim was hailed as a saviour when took over Valencia in 2014 but – seven managers later – the fans now want him out. How did it come to this?
results.secPara: At a press conference held in a Valencia hotel two weeks ago, Jesús Suso García Pitarch was asked why Peter Lim had bought the citys football team in the first place. It was a loaded question, one supporters have pondered often over the last couple of years, and the answer, or the lack of one, felt loaded as well. Pitarch, the sporting director recently back from Singapore where he had met with the owner to discuss plans for the club only to resign soon after, replied that he had never asked and had no explanation either. I dont know, he said. I suppose he likes football.
results.webTitle: Chaos at Mestalla: Valencia's journey from Champions League to utter disarray

results.firPara: Joël Matip has not travelled with the Liverpool squad for the FA Cup replay at Plymouth on Wednesday.
results.secPara: Jürgen Klopp was due consult Liverpools lawyers over whether to select Matip amid concern the defenders inclusion could result in the clubs expulsion from the competition.
results.webTitle: Liverpool’s Joël Matip left out of FA Cup replay squad at Plymouth

results.firPara: Louis van Gaal has backtracked on his suggestion on Monday that he has retired from coaching. The former Manchester United manager is still open to returning if he receives an attractive offer.
results.secPara: The 65-year-old appeared to signal the end of his career in an interview with the Dutch newspaper De Telegraaf, which stated events in his family had caused him to turn down a lucrative offer from Asia worth £11m a season.
results.webTitle: Former Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal backtracks on retirement

results.firPara: Todays flim-flam wants to create a little dysentery among the ranks
results.secPara: Todays flim-flam wants to create a little dysentery among the ranks
results.webTitle: Football transfer rumours: Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United?

results.secPara: The spirit of Graham Taylor loomed large at Sincil Bank but Lincoln City honoured their former manager by producing a stunning display of which he would surely have been proud.
results.webTitle: Nathan Arnold’s stoppage time winner sends ecstatic Lincoln City into fourth round

results.firPara: Jürgen Klopp will consult Liverpools lawyers over whether to select Joël Matip at Plymouth Argyle amid concern the defenders inclusion could result in the clubs expulsion from the FA Cup.
results.secPara: The Liverpool manager is in the farcical position of needing legal advice over his team selection for the third-round replay having failed to get clarification from Fifa or the Cameroon football federation over Matips eligibility.
results.webTitle: Liverpool’s Jürgen Klopp seeks legal advice over Joël Matip stalemate

results.firPara: Rafael Benítez remains quietly optimistic that Mike Ashley will continue backing his transfer market judgment and allow him to strengthen Newcastle Uniteds squad as he sees fit this month.
results.secPara: It is understood that Newcastles owner, who still listens to the advice of Graham Carr, the Championship-topping clubs chief scout, would prefer Benítez to acquire players aged 25 and younger with potential for high sell-on values but, although broadly happy with that policy, the manager craves the odd slightly more experienced recruit.
results.webTitle: Newcastle United’s Rafael Benítez hopeful of backing in transfer market
